amendment.description: An amendment numbered 61 printed in the Congressional Record to insert language stating that any drawdown that the Secretary determines will result in a net profit for the Federal Government.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lieu amendment (A075) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 229 (Roll no. 91).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A075) offered by Mr. Lieu.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lieu amendment (A075) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 229 (Roll no. 91).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
